channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 2nd December
item.description:
I live at 38 Lauriston Park, The Park, Cheltenham, GL50 2QL We have a large centre island with various trees and hedgeâ€™s which over time has become very overgrown, the trees have grown extremely high and overhang. Please can you arrange for an inspection to see that they are safe and could be cut back. Neighbours park their cars around this island so would need to be informed to move them should any work be scheduled, our close has a walk and cycle path which is very busy particularly at School times with many vehicles going around the island I am concerned that the restrictive vision could result in an accident, especially with cyclists.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 pot holes as you drive up lane, 2nd December
item.description:
2 pot holes on right of single lane before the first gate way on left of the knapp
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): The Knapp, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Once you press the button to use the pedestrian crossing, it randomly turns off without showing the green man. We use this crossing daily and it happens every time. Sometimes I have to press the button 5 times before the green man shows which can take some time. Danergous when trying to teach young children how to cross the road properly., 2nd December
item.description:
Pedestrian crossing both sides, Cheltenham road and Old Cheltenham road junction
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road, Longlevens, Gloucester

item.title: Drain under railway bridge is blocked again, 2nd December
item.description:
The drain under the railway bridge. When it rained last Friday the water cooled again. It still hasn't completely gone and it hasn't rained for over 24 hours now.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Station Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
